entry.title: about
entry.content:
About me

Welcome! I am Yuanlong Zhou（周元龙/Ryan）,

a Master’s student majoring in Computer Science at Texas A&M University in USA, with consolidated knowledge and hands-on experience in Full-Stack Development, AWS Cloud, Machine Learning, AIGC, DevOps, Data Analytics, Game Design.

I am also

  • a scientific researcher on AIGC solutions (text to image, text/image to 3d model), object detection/segmentation/tracking (Grounding-DINO, SAM2), 3d reconstruction (SLAM), and 3d mesh data processing (MeshLab/Unity3D).
  • a practitioner for Computer Graphics/Vision, scripting OpenGL shader compilation and CUDA GPU computations.
  • a passionate open-source contributor for various Machine/Deep Learning and multi-modal LLM system solutions.
  • a creative VR/AR game developer with leadership & team skills, releasing several commercial works on Steam.

     

 

Specialization:
Full-Stack Development (Web/Mobile/PC), Cloud Service (AWS), AIGC, Multimodal LLM, Computer Graphics/Vision, VR/AR Game & Animation, Database (SQL, NoSQL), Machine/Deep Learning, System Architecture, Algorithm, etc.

Education:
2023/08-2024/12: M.Sc in Computer Science, Texas A&M University, USA.
2019/09-2023/07: B.Eng. in Computer Science & Finance (Dual-degree), Sichuan University, China.
GPA: 3.8 / 4.0 Toefl: 106 (29/26/23/28) GRE: 324 (155/169/4)

Phone (WhatsApp): +1 (979)-344-4239
E-mail: ryanbowz@outlook.com
Address: 302 Ball Street, College Station, Texas, 77840

Identity: F1 student visa, requiring sponsorship for OPT (STEM 24-month extension) and H-1B status in future.

Skillsets:
Languages: Mandarin (Native), English (Professional Fluent).
Values: Proactive, Ownership, Leadership, Dive Deep, Work Ethic, Organizational, Learning Agility, …
Coding Languages: C/C++, Java, Python, C#, Go, SQL, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, OpenGL (WebGL), VBA, R.
Software: Adobe Acrobat, MS Office (Word, Excel macros, PPT), Google Drive, GitHub, Unity3D, Matlab, CAD, SPSS, VMware, Stata, Tibco, Oracle, CRM, CMake, Gradle, 3dsMax, Linux (Red Hat, Ubuntu), IDEA, PyCharm, Visual Studio.

Course List:
Object-Oriented Programming (C++, Java, Python), System Design, AI and Deep Learning, Computer Animation, Human AI interaction, Programming LLM, Mobile Wireless Network, Digital Logic and Digital System, Multimedia Technology, Data Visualization, Computer Organization, Data Structure and Algorithm Analysis, Computer Graphics, Discrete Mathematics, Operating System, Microcomputer System and Interface, The Art of Game, Computer Network, Advanced Software Engineering, Web Front-end: H5 + CSS3 + JS, Database System, Principle of Compiler, Computer Architectures, Linear Algebra, Calculus, Probability Statistics, Discrete Mathematics.
Political Economy, Accounting, Microeconomics, Public Finance, Macroeconomics, Statistics, Finance, Corporate Finance, Econometrics, Monetary economics and monetary policy, International Economics, Financial Engineering, International Trade, Financial Econometrics, E-finance, Politics Economy and Diplomacy of European Union, Engineering Project Investment and Financing, Financial Risk Management, Security Investment.

 

Quick Jump: portfolio awards certificates blog
If you want to learn more about me, you can read corresponding pages or refer to my Resume/CV.

Last Update: 2024/09/01
